heroheader: Egy traveler your best way to have fun in Egypt
herosubheader: Egytraveler is designed to revolutionize the way you have fun in Egypt. Utilizing advanced computer vision and augmented reality technologies, it enhances your tourist experience by offering interactive and immersive adventures at famous landmarks and monuments. Explore different cities, book hotels, and delve into Egypt's rich history with our app as your trusted guide.
phonetext: Introducing EgyTraveler â€“ the app that transforms your Egypt experience. Easily recognize monuments and landmarks with text-to-speech tech, making your trip both easier and more entertaining. Scan objects to learn historical facts instantly. Plus, bring your favorite items to life using AR technology through your camera. EgyTraveler: your go-to for a seamless and fun-filled exploration of Egypt's rich heritage.
ourreason: Our reason to travel with us
youcandownload: You can download our app from the link bellow
subject: Subject
whoarewetext: We are recent graduates from the Faculty of Computers and Informatics at Suez Canal University, specializing in Computer Science. Our passion for innovation has driven us to embark on an exciting journey to create an E-Tourism application. Our goal is to simplify the tourism experience, making it not only more accessible but also incredibly enjoyable.
ourpurposetext: EgyTraveler is more than just a website; it's your gateway to exploring cities, embarking on captivating tours, and finding the perfect accommodation to enhance your stay in Egypt. Our purpose is to simplify the travel planning process and ensure that every moment of your journey is filled with excitement and joy.
